flavor: You imbue the weapon with reverberating sound waves.

might.label: Sonic (Might)
might.level-8-deafened: On a critical hit, the target must succeed at a Fortitude save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 1 minute, or 1 hour on a critical failure.
might.level-12-resistance: The sonic damage dealt by this imbued property ignores resistances.
might.level-14-deafened: On a critical hit, the target must succeed at a Fortitude save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 1 minute, or permanently on a critical failure.
might.level-20-weakness: On a successful Strike with the weapon, before applying sonic damage, the target gains weakness 1 to sonic until the beginning of your next turn.

tech.label: Sonic (Technique)
tech.level-8-deafened: On a critical hit, the target must succeed at a Fortitude save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 1 minute, or 1 hour on a critical failure.
tech.level-12-resistance: The sonic damage dealt by this imbued property (including persistent sonic damage) ignores resistances.
tech.level-16-deafened: On a critical hit, the target must succeed at a Fortitude save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 1 minute, or permanently on a critical failure. On failure and critical failure the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.
tech.level-20-boom: The sonic damage and persistent sonic damage create a sonic boom, affecting all creatures adjacent to the target with an AC lower than or equal to your attack roll. On a critical hit, all creatures that take sonic damage in this way must attempt the Fortitude save to avoid being deafened and stunned.
